## ContentRenderer interface

Renderer used for rendering (data) content

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ContentRenderer<TOrdering> extends GridPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ordering](./grid.contentrenderer.ordering.md) | <code>TOrdering</code> | Information about current ordering state |
|  [orderingChange](./grid.contentrenderer.orderingchange.md) | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Indication that ordering has changed |
